sentences.en: Human and succubus hybrids can cast haste and slow.
sentences.cn: 人类和女妖的混血儿可以施放加速和减速魔法.

sentences.en: Shamans ? Human and succubus hybrids can cast haste and slow.
sentences.cn: 人类和 魅 魔的混血儿可以施放加速和减速魔法.

sentences.en: She was no longer the alternate succubus.
sentences.cn: 她不再是那个轮番变幻的魔女了.

sentences.en: Succubus : You broke free of my spell. I like that.
sentences.cn: 梦魇: 打破了我的法术, 我很欣赏.

sentences.en: Succubus: Come here little boy, and show me what you've got.
sentences.cn: 梦: 来吧小子, 看看你有什么本事.

sentences.en: Succubus: Health increased by 20 %, armor increased 22 %.
sentences.cn: 魅魔: 生命值上升20%, 护甲增加22%.

sentences.en: Succubus: Increases your Shadow damage done by 15 %.
sentences.cn: 媚魔: 增加你的暗影伤害15%.

sentences.en: The succubus is the female counterpart of the incubus. She is a demon seductress who preys on sleeping men, draining them of their “vitality.”
sentences.cn: 女淫妖与男淫妖相对应，指的是一种以入睡男子为猎物，吸收他们精元的妖魔。

trans.tran_cn: （传说与睡梦中的男子交媾的）女淫妖，淫妇，娼妇，妓女
trans.tran_en: a female devil that in the past was believed to have sex with a sleeping man
